tool_description: Get synonym and antonyms for any word. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/thesaurus.
name: Thesaurus by API-Ninjas
title: Thesaurus by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/thesaurus
api_list.description: API Ninjas Thesaurus API endpoint. Returns a list of synonyms and a list of antonyms for a given word.
